
```{r}
plot_timeseries(
csv_tv  = "https://github.com/mhepner90/RVC/blob/master/trophic_level/tlbio.csv",
title   = "Trophic Level",
y_label = "Biomass",
skip    = 0,
filter  = "TL == 1",
col_t   = "year",
col_y   = "biomass")
```
